MWS2R3 - AD Rename Computer
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# ScriptName: AD Rename Computer # Author: Mark Freeman # Required Variables: COMPONENTID, INSTANCEID # Description: # # Renames a computer based on MWS2 naming standard # Registers the computername and IP address in the key value store # Downloads common and computer specific files from the deployment file share # Resets the local administrator account password to a random value # Registers the password in the key value share # Updates the instance name in Cloud Provider # # 2015/05/21 DRidley -Updated Rename Computer section to check if IstanceID has already been deployed
. .\GlobalRepository.ps1
$ComponentID = $COMPONENTID $InstanceID = $INSTANCEID $DomainFQDN = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainFQDN")).value
$CustomerID = (get-globalvariable "Global/CustomerID").value $LocationID = (get-globalvariable "Global/LocationID").value
# Set Primary & Secondary DNS on active NIC. This is required to check if InstanceID has already been deployed $PrimaryDNS = (get-globalvariable("AD\PrimaryDNS")).value $SecondaryDNS = (get-globalvariable("AD\SecondaryDNS")).value $NICindex = Get-NetAdapter -physical | where status -eq 'up' | Select 'Name' -ExpandProperty ifIndex Write-Output "Setting $PrimaryDNS and $SecondaryDNS as DNS servers on active NIC" Set-DNSClientServerAddress -InterfaceIndex $NICindex -ServerAddresses ($PrimaryDNS,$SecondaryDNS)
# Rename Computer $Computername = $($CustomerID + $ComponentID + $LocationID + $InstanceID + "W") Write-Output "Checking if $Computername has been previously deployed..." If (Test-Connection -Computername "$Computername.$DomainFQDN" -Count 2 -Quiet) { Write-Output "ERROR: $Computername is already deployed! Exiting..." EXIT 1 } Else { Write-Output "$ComponentID-$InstanceID does not appear to have been previously deployed. Continuing..." Write-Output "Setting computername to $Computername" Rename-Computer -NewName $Computername -force }
write-output "Storing IP Address in key value store" $key = 'Network/{0}' -f $Computername $ip = Get-NetIPAddress | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.AddressFamily -eq "IPv4" } | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.IPAddress -ne "127.0.0.1"} $ipa = $ip.IPAddress Set-globalvariable $key $ipa
write-output "Downloading common files and computer files from repository"
get-files "$ComponentID$InstanceID"
write-output "Resetting local administrator password" . .\New-RandomPassword.ps1 $password = new-randompassword -PasswordLength 10 $adminUser = [ADSI] "WinNT://./SOE-LOAD,User" $adminUser.SetPassword($password) Set-globalvariable "Administrator/$Computername" $password
#register name tag #write-output "Registering AWS name tag" #$aid = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id #$uri = "http://10.0.0.23:5000/p1/" + $aid + "?tagname=" + $Computername #Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $uri -Method Put
write-output "Restarting computer"

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R3 - AD Add Domain Controller
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# ScriptName: AD Add Domain Controller # Author: Mark Freeman # Required Variables: None # Description: # # Adds a second domain controller to the resource domain
#include dynamic data store # Load Common functions . .\Logging.ps1 . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1
write-output "Restricting RPC Port Ranges" MD HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\Rpc\Internet New-ItemProperty -Path HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\Rpc\Internet -Name Ports -PropertyType MultiString -Value "49152-49407" New-ItemProperty -Path HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\Rpc\Internet -Name PortsInternetAvailable -PropertyType String -Value "Y" New-ItemProperty -Path HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\Rpc\Internet -Name UseInternetPorts -PropertyType String -Value "Y"
write-output "Creating folders" MD e:\Admin MD e:\Scripts
write-output "Creating reserve file" fsutil file createnew e:\reservefile 512000000
#install roles and features
$addsTools = "RSAT-AD-Tools"
Add-WindowsFeature $addsTools
#Install AD DS, DNS and GPMC
start-job -Name addFeature -ScriptBlock { Add-WindowsFeature -Name "ad-domain-services" -IncludeAllSubFeature -IncludeManagementTools Add-WindowsFeature -Name "dns" -IncludeAllSubFeature -IncludeManagementTools Add-WindowsFeature -Name "gpmc" -IncludeAllSubFeature -IncludeManagementTools } Wait-Job -Name addFeature
# Create New Forest, add Domain Controller
$domainname = (get-globalvariable "Global\DomainFQDN").value $domainNB = (get-globalvariable "Global\DomainNetBIOS").value $domainjoin_short_username = (get-globalvariable "Global\DeploymentUsername").value $domainjoinusername = "$domainNB\$domainjoin_short_username" $domainjoinpassword = (get-globalvariable "Global\DeploymentPassword").value $dsrmPassword = (get-globalvariable "Global\DomainDSRMPassword").value write-output "Adding DC to " $domainname " using account " $domainjoinusername
$dnsip = (get-globalvariable "AD\PrimaryDNS").value write-output "setting primary dns to $dnsip" $na=Get-NetAdapter -Physical | where status -eq 'up' Set-DnsClientServerAddress -InterfaceIndex $na.ifIndex -ServerAddresses ($dnsip,"127.0.0.1")
$secure_dsrm_pwd = convertto-securestring $dsrmPassword -asplaintext -force $secure_dj_pwd = convertto-securestring $domainjoinpassword -asplaintext -force
$cred = new-object -typename System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ` -argumentlist $domainjoinusername, $secure_dj_pwd
Import-Module ADDSDeployment Install-ADDSDomainController ` -NoGlobalCatalog:$false ` -CreateDnsDelegation:$False ` -Credential $cred ` -CriticalReplicationOnly:$false ` -DatabasePath "E:\NTDS-DB" ` -DomainName $domainname ` -SafeModeAdministratorPassword $secure_dsrm_pwd ` -InstallDns:$True ` -LogPath "L:\NTDS-Logs" ` -NoRebootOnCompletion:$true ` -SysvolPath "E:\SYSVOL" ` -Force:$true ` -Confirm:$false
$ip = Get-NetIPAddress | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.AddressFamily -eq "IPv4" } | Where-Object -FilterScript {$_.IPAddress -ne "127.0.0.1"} $ipa = $ip.IPAddress Set-GlobalVariable "AD\SecondaryDNS" $ip.IPAddress
